"Mine to chase Vorr of course! When you die, I want to kill him myself, but I can"t find him. But I find her all the green valley with soldiers to fight. They hide from the demons, but you show strength and they join in." Skizzik stated.

"Where is this place?" I asked. I could always use a few extra troops.

"Reach only through the green portal, but you better hurry, because the enemy is close!"

Skizzik joined in, and his troops returned to the Keep for training.
map.hc7_main:0.monster.12.33.0.message: "Go back to your pens! You will pay Lord Onsten with your head for this!"
map.hc7_main:0.monster.17.20.0.message: "It"s time to go back to your holes, you stinkers!" the crossbowmen shout, aiming at you.
map.hc7_main:0.monster.17.28.0.message: Spreading their wings, griffins squawk angrily at you from their nests on the hills.  You were expecting an ambush.  Lord Onsten would never leave this gold mine unguarded.
map.hc7_main:1.guards.27.20.0.message: The monks carrying these sandals to their monastery refuse to give up the artifact.  Do you want to attack them to take away the saint"s sandals?
map.hc7_main:1.guards.9.35.0.message:
You hear rustling in the bushes, but when no one attacks you, you decide to go deeper into the forest.

After a dozen or so steps, you find a family of basilisks trapped in a wolf"s pit.  The creatures are exhausted but still enraged.  Your companions advise you not to approach - irritated basilisks are very dangerous - but you don"t listen to them.

You cut down the nearest tree and throw it into the pit, giving the creatures a chance to escape and gaining their loyalty.
map.hc7_main:1.monster.8.29.0.message: Before you approached them, the shooters were training in a mercenary camp, but when they see you, they turn their crossbows away from the straw dolls and point them at you.
map.hc7_main:1.town.28.3.0.event.0.descr:
For Computer - DO NOT TRANSLATE

For a computer - DO NOT TRANSLATE

:P
map.hc7_main:2.guards.18.35.0.message: Several of Baron Paglon"s soldiers unsuccessfully try to move a self-filling ore cart through the muddy mud, but they are unable to move it without the animals" help.  You see determination in their faces, they are ready to defend the artifact at all costs. Do you want to attack them now?
map.hc7_main:2.guards.33.15.0.message:
All paths lead you to this place where the ring of life was supposedly hidden centuries ago.  Unfortunately, your spies report that there are several monks and priests nearby, ready to attack as soon as you reach for the ring.

Will you order your men to attack the monks?
map.hc7_main:2.monster.22.35.0.message:
"Do you have any food? Paglon has seen no need to feed us for the past three days," says the lizardman. 

As you share food with them from your own meager supplies, the lizardmen ask if they could join your army.

"At least we"ll have full bellies," they joke.
map.hc7_main:2.monster.32.27.0.message: "You have no right to be in the royal gold mine! Leave!"
map.hc7_main:3.monster.13.24.0.message: "This sawmill belongs to his majesty and as long as we guard it, it will remain so!"
map.hc7_main:3.monster.14.4.0.message: Royal griffins built their nests above the entrance to the gold mine, watching for the slightest movement among the swamps.  Not even a mouse can slip past them.
map.hc7_main:3.monster.15.41.0.message:
"Count Rambert predicted that you would travel along this route! Now, drop your weapons. You are our prisoners," shouts one of the crusaders.

"You"re asking too much of us," you reply.  "We will not give up!"
map.hc7_main:3.monster.17.63.0.message: "This sawmill belongs to his majesty. Leave here or die!"
map.hc7_main:3.monster.2.6.0.message: "Ha! We knew our treasure would lure your slaves here! Now let"s earn our reward!"
map.hc7_main:3.monster.28.64.0.message: You see a group of gnolls jumping and waving excitedly, trying to get your attention.  More volunteers.
map.hc7_main:3.monster.28.69.0.message: Today you learned that not all swamp creatures want to join your fight.  These giant dragonflies have taken up residence on the roof of the mill and attack whenever you approach it.
map.hc7_main:3.monster.7.36.0.message: "Stop!" shouts the leader of the Crusaders.  "You have no right to travel on this route. You will be punished for it!"
map.hc7_main:4.guards.1.35.0.message: You greedily reach for the bottomless bag of gold and wrap your fingers around it.  You haven"t found any gold mines in this area so far, so this artifact will be extremely useful.
map.hc7_main:4.guards.23.35.0.message: You haven"t found any sawmills in this area yet, so this self-filling ore cart will be extremely useful.
map.hc7_main:4.guards.28.12.0.message: You stop a group of Erathian soldiers dragging cages with giant dragonflies behind them.  When they see you, they abandon them and prepare to defend their prisoners.
map.hc7_main:4.monster.13.27.0.message: These swordsmen"s weapons are covered in fresh blood.  You order your men to launch an attack, even though you know what they are capable of.
map.hc7_main:4.monster.19.29.0.message: "Only the king can use this passage! Leave here, slaves, and end your futile rebellion!" shout the champions, preparing to charge.
map.hc7_main:4.monster.22.19.1.message: The tunnels ahead are blocked by creatures you"ve never seen in this area before - royal minotaurs.  Even your enemy probably hasn"t dealt with these monsters and you can imagine what treasures may lie in the corridors on the other side.
map.hc7_main:6.guards.1.26.0.message: A band of rebellious gnolls and lizardmen call this part of the swamp their homeland.  Not only do they have large supplies of resources, their leader also carries a larger gnoll flail.  Do you want to attack them to get the magic weapon?
map.hc7_main:6.guards.2.41.0.message: Several one-eyed guards slumber near the Cyclops King"s tunic.  Will you order your men to attack them to obtain this artifact?
map.hc7_main:6.guards.26.38.0.message: A pack of gnolls emerges from hiding.  Their leader, a fat gnoll with a broken crown on his head, hangs back, shouting orders to his soldiers.  Do you want to duel the gnoll king to take his buckler?
map.hc7_main:6.guards.36.19.0.message: The trolls must have realized the value of this magical shield, because they placed several guards next to it.  Will you face them to obtain the mad ogre"s shield?
map.hc7_main:6.monster.66.5.0.message: There"s something in the look in these ogres" beady eyes that tells you they"re more interested in crushing your head than fighting for a noble cause.
map.hc7_main:7.guards.11.69.0.message: You are being attacked by bandits hired by Mad King Gryphonheart!
map.hc7_main:7.guards.12.37.0.message: You are attacked by Mad King Gryphonheart"s bandits!
map.hc7_main:7.guards.25.42.0.message: You are being attacked by bandits hired by Mad King Gryphonheart!
map.hc7_main:7.guards.55.52.0.message: Mad King Gryphonheart"s bandits are attacking you!
map.hc7_main:7.guards.7.22.0.message: You have been ambushed by the scoundrels of Mad King Gryphonheart!
map.hc8_main:3.quest.40.27.0.completed: You have finally arrived, Tarnum!  Do you wish to pass?
map.hc8_main:3.quest.40.27.0.firstVisit: The guards inform you that only Tarnum can pass through this gate.
map.hc8_main:3.quest.40.27.0.nextVisit: The guards will only let Tarnum through.
map.hc8_main:3.quest.56.71.0.completed:
You drive carts filled with wood and ore to the wizard"s cottage and personally hand him several pouches of gold.

"Here are the raw materials you need to build your tower," you announce.

"Thank you! Would you like to make an exchange now?"
map.hc8_main:3.quest.56.71.0.firstVisit:
You notice an old wizard leaning over a table covered with countless scrolls.  You wait for him to notice you before you speak.

"These are the plans for the tower, aren"t they? You ask him.

"That"s how it is. I dream of building my own wizard tower, but unfortunately I don"t have enough materials."

"What raw materials do you need?"

"Hmm, let"s see," says the wizard, reaching for one of the scrolls.  "The tower will require 50 carts of wood, 50 carts of ore and 3,000 gold pieces to pay the builders."

"I see. And what could you offer me in exchange for providing you with these raw materials?" you ask him, your voice echoing like the voice of an experienced merchant.

The wizard considers your words for a moment, then smiles broadly.

"I accidentally found out that you are looking for blue dragons, but before they join you, you will have to defeat several of them. The only creature that I think could help you in this is the crystal dragon. Its creation is not easy and requires a lot of this precious resource. In exchange for your supplies, I will give you 60 crystals."
map.hc8_main:3.quest.56.71.0.nextVisit:
You ask the wizard again what exactly he needs to build his tower.  This time he hands you a list.

50 carts of wood
50 ore carts
3000 gold pieces

No less, no more!
map.hc8_main:4.guards.29.34.0.message: For Computer ONLY - DO NOT TRANSLATE
map.hc8_main:4.guards.9.12.0.message: For Computer ONLY - DO NOT TRANSLATE
map.hc8_main:4.quest.21.5.0.completed:
The old elf Vori looks at the elves you present and seems pleased with their abilities.

"Great! I have 30 crystals inside, wait here a moment and I"ll bring them in a moment," he says.

Do you want to make a trade?
map.hc8_main:4.quest.21.5.0.firstVisit: The old elf Vori who lives in this hollow tree explains to you that he is looking for archers who would agree to protect him on his important journey south.  He does not reveal the purpose of his journey, but he is ready to offer 30 crystals for the temporary employment of 40 high elves.
map.hc8_main:4.quest.21.5.0.nextVisit:
"No, I can only trust the high elves. Only they will provide me with adequate protection," says the old elf Vori.

You decide not to argue with him.
map.hc8_main:7.guards.58.26.0.message: Suddenly, clouds of snow shoot up around you as a group of Gelu"s elite shooters appear out of nowhere and attack you!
map.hc8_main:7.heroes.16.name: Vol
map.hc8_main:7.quest.3.41.0.completed:
You wrestle with the hero for almost an hour, but in the end you manage to tip the scales of victory in your favor.

The hero stands up and shakes his head, laughing loudly.

"It"s been a very long time since I last lost," he states.

He immediately enters his apartment, only to emerge a moment later with several bags of gold.

"Your reward," he announces, handing you the pouch, "you deserve it!"
map.hc8_main:7.quest.3.41.0.firstVisit:
You set aside a few hours to chat with the large man chopping firewood outside his strange hut.  All the while, he brags about his countless adventures and even challenges you to wrestle with him.

"The winner will receive 8,950 gold pieces," he announces.

"What if I lose?"

"Nothing," says the hero, smiling, "except that you will have to live with the knowledge of a shameful failure."

You agree to fight, but you are quickly pinned to the ground.  Your opponent bursts into laughter, explaining to you that you had absolutely no chance.

"You are not experienced enough yet. Come back when your skills are at least as good as mine."
map.hc8_main:7.quest.3.41.0.nextVisit: You challenge the giant hero living here to another wrestling match, but again it turns out that until you reach level 26, each fight will end very quickly.
